statements: SELECT * FROM UserPermissions WHERE permission_level > 3;
SELECT id, username FROM UserPermissions WHERE qr_code_access = TRUE;
SELECT username, permission_level FROM UserPermissions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions WHERE permission_level <= 2;
SELECT id, username, permission_level FROM UserPermissions WHERE qr_code_access = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, permission_level FROM UserPermissions WHERE permission_level > 2 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, qr_code_access FROM UserPermissions WHERE qr_code_access = TRUE AND permission_level < 5;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions WHERE permission_level IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT username, permission_level, qr_code_access FROM UserPermissions WHERE qr_code_access = FALSE AND id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM user_permissions
SELECT tool_id, tool_name, tool_description FROM payment_processing_tools
SELECT permission_type, user_id FROM user_permissions ORDER BY permission_type ASC
SELECT tool_name, tool_id FROM payment_processing_tools WHERE tool_id > 2
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT permission_type, user_id FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_type = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_type = 'user' AND user_id < 5;
SELECT tool_id, tool_name, tool_description FROM payment_processing_tools WHERE tool_id > 3;
SELECT tool_description, tool_id, tool_name FROM payment_processing_tools WHERE tool_name LIKE 'payment%' ORDER BY tool_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 1;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, qr_code_access FROM user_permissions WHERE qr_code_access = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, permission_level, qr_code_access FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_name FROM user_permissions LEFT JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_level = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, qr_code_access FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2 AND qr_code_access = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(role_id) AS role_count FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id HAVING role_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(*) as role_count FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id GROUP BY u.username;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id ORDER BY u.username ASC, r.role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT role_id, permission_id FROM roles_permissions ORDER BY role_id DESC, permission_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, qr_code_id, access_granted FROM qr_code_access WHERE access_granted = true;
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC, role_id ASC;
SELECT permission_name, role_id FROM permissions p JOIN roles_permissions rp ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id WHERE p.permission_name = 'Admin';
SELECT u.user_id, COUNT(qa.qr_code_id) AS total_accesses FROM user_roles u LEFT JOIN qr_code_access qa ON u.user_id = qa.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id;
SELECT ur.user_id, COUNT(rs.session_id) AS total_sessions FROM user_roles ur INNER JOIN user_sessions rs ON ur.user_id = rs.user_id GROUP BY ur.user_id HAVING COUNT(rs.session_id) > 5;

SELECT r.role_id, p.permission_name, u.user_id FROM roles_permissions r JOIN permissions p ON r.permission_id = p.permission_id JOIN user_roles u ON r.role_id = u.role_id ORDER BY r.role_id ASC, p.permission_name DESC, u.user_id ASC;
